Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute near 119th/Wood
ShortDescription: 119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 119th/Wood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 119th/Wood.

Southbound buses will operate via 119th, Ashland, 115th, Vincennes, 119th, then resume their normal route.

Northbound buses will operate via 119th, Vincennes, 115th, Marshfield, 119th, then resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
